title: Add Profile/Account Summary Section to Home Page

requirements.summary: Add a profile/account summary section at the bottom of the Home page displaying user info or login prompt, quick-link cards for My Orders, Saved Addresses, Loyalty Points, and Help & Support, and a Go to Profile button
acceptanceCriteria: When the user is logged in (authStore.isLoggedIn === true), the section displays the user's name and phone number from authStore
When the user is not logged in, the section displays a 'Login / Sign Up' prompt card
A row of four quick-link cards is shown: 'My Orders', 'Saved Addresses', 'Loyalty Points', and 'Help & Support', each with an icon
Tapping any quick-link card navigates to the Profile page
A 'Go to Profile' button is present and navigates to the Profile page
The section is placed below the CustomerCareContact banner on the Home page
The section uses MurkiMart orange (#F97316) and green (#16A34A) consistently in card/tile styling

file_operations.description: Create a new ProfileSummary component that displays a profile/account summary section. The component reads from authStore to check if a user is logged in. If logged in (authStore.isLoggedIn === true), it displays the user's name and phone number in a styled card. If not logged in, it shows a 'Login / Sign Up' prompt card with an appropriate icon and message. Below the user info or login prompt, render a 2x2 grid of quick-link cards with icons for 'My Orders', 'Saved Addresses', 'Loyalty Points', and 'Help & Support'. Each quick-link card uses navigationStore to navigate to the Profile page when tapped. At the bottom, include a 'Go to Profile' button that also navigates to the Profile page using navigationStore. Style all cards with MurkiMart orange (#F97316) and green (#16A34A) theme colors, using a consistent card/tile layout with rounded corners, shadows, and appropriate spacing. Use Lucide React icons (User, ShoppingBag, MapPin, Award, HelpCircle) for the user info and quick-link cards.

Import the new ProfileSummary component and add it to the Home page layout. Place the <ProfileSummary /> component below the <CustomerCareContact /> component and above any footer padding or bottom navigation space. Ensure there is appropriate vertical spacing (e.g., mt-6 or mt-8) between CustomerCareContact and ProfileSummary, and between ProfileSummary and the end of the page content. The ProfileSummary section should render within the existing page container/padding structure to maintain consistent margins with other Home page sections.
